section.name: Gemma current version
section.p: For details see the release notes .

subsection.name: Binaries

ul.li:
gemmaCli-1.7.jar
- The Gemma command line tool package.

subsection.p: Note that these files are not likely to be of immediate use, as most functionality requires a correctly configured system with a Gemma database. If you are interested in establishing your own Gemma installation, please contact us for assistance.

ul.li:
baseCode-1.0.11-src.zip
- BaseCode is a set of code used by multiple projects in our lab. More details about basecode are here .

subsection.name: Older versions
subsection.p: Older versions will be available in the archives .
